mapper.insert: insert into cust (cust_id, cust_addr, cust_email, cust_name, cust_pn, cust_pw, cust_oaddr, cust_detailaddr, cust_birth) values (#{cust_id}, #{cust_addr}, #{cust_email}, #{cust_name}, #{cust_pn}, #{cust_pw}, #{cust_oaddr}, #{cust_detailaddr}, #{cust_birth}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `cust_id`=VALUES(`cust_id`);
mapper.select: select cust_id, cust_pw, cust_name, cust_addr, cust_pn, cust_email from cust where cust_id = #{custId}
